mapper.select: SELECT s.* FROM subjects s JOIN incorrect_note inc ON s.subject_id = inc.subject_id WHERE inc.user_id = #{userId} AND s.deleted = FALSE GROUP BY s.subject_id
SELECT count(*) FROM incorrect_note WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_my_question

choose.when: SELECT DISTINCT l.level FROM my_questions_levels l JOIN incorrect_note icn ON l.level = icn.level AND is_my_question = TRUE WHERE icn.user_id = #{userId} and l.deleted = false ORDER BY level

choose.otherwise:
SELECT DISTINCT l.level FROM my_questions_levels l JOIN incorrect_note icn ON l.level = icn.level AND is_my_question = TRUE WHERE icn.user_id = #{userId} AND l.deleted = FALSE
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT l.level FROM levels l JOIN incorrect_note icn ON l.level = icn.level AND l.subject_id = icn.subject_id WHERE icn.user_id = #{userId} AND l.deleted = FALSE
ORDER BY level
